hello_back_msg: Hello, how can I help you?
locale_choice_prompt: What's your preferred language to talk?
locale_choice_result: Ok, we will talk with %s next.
wrong_understanding: Sorry I didn't understand your intention correctly, please try another saying!
interrupt_warning: This will cancel current dialog and enter a new one
invalid_choice: Not in provided options, please retry
thumbnail_confirm: You want to get thumbnail of image, right？
thumbnail_summary: You want thumbnial with size %s * %s，working, please wait a while...
thumbnail_height: What's the height of thumbnail? Just input number.
extracttext_confirm: You want to extract text from image, right?
extracttext_summary: Extracting text, please wait a while...
extracttext_fail: No words extracted, please provide a image with text in it!
analyze_confirm: You want to analyze image, right?
analyze_summary: Analyzing image, please wait a while...
image_choice_prompt: Please select the way to provide image:
